description.displayText: Amanda started off as a date night babysitter for our daughter but transitioned into working full-time during Covid as we needed coverage. Amanda is fun and playful and I always knew my daughter had a fun time when Amanda came over. She helped with meals, putting my daughter down for naps/bedtime, took her to many parks around Long Beach, bike rides, and to play at the beach. I always knew I could trust Amanda with my daughter and any family would be lucky to have her!
description.originalText: Amanda started off as a date night babysitter for our daughter but transitioned into working full-time during Covid as we needed coverage. description.displayText: We interviewed Amanda to be our nanny for our 4 month old son and hired her to babysit him as a trial. She was fantastic! She was on time, was able to read his cues for hunger and nap time, and was friendly and professional. We felt comfortable with her and she was very good at communicating with us. We would have hired her to be our nanny, but another family hired her first. Amanda is the one that got away and we will continue to hire her for babysitting when she is available!
description.originalText: We interviewed Amanda to be our nanny for our 4 month old son and hired her to babysit him as a trial. She was fantastic! She was on time, was able to read his cues for hunger and nap time, and was friendly and professional. We felt comfortable with her and she was very good at communicating with us. We would have hired her to be our nanny, but another family hired her first. Amanda is the one that got away and we will continue to hire her for babysitting when she is available!

description.displayText:
Amanda watched our kids (daughter of 11 and son of 5) when my wife and I went on date night. She was great with the children, very understanding and interested and our kids loved her! 

Amanda was pro-actively involved and kept the kids busy which is an important quality that we always look for in a baby sitter especially since my son can sometimes be quite energetic!

I can definitely recommend her and we will use her again!
description.originalText:

I can definitely recommend her and we will use her again!

description.displayText: Besides being my daughter, Amanda is the youngest of four children. She is the only girl. She is currently employed with the county school district and works the after-school program. She tutors twice a week. She babysits frequently every month. Therefore, Amanda is not only always surrounding herself with children but she loves to be around them. Being her mother, I have always noticed that Amanda, ever since elementary school, has always been the more mature and responsible one out of her friend groups and I find that very important in a babysitter/nanny. Please consider her for the responsible caregiver for your child/children. Thanks!

description.displayText:
Amanda works the After School Program at an elementary school. She supervises school aged children M-F from 2-6. She has been a wonderful employee! She is on time, flexible, creative & the kids adore her. She works well with the other employees. 
Amanda has been an asset to our After School Program!
